title: Chantal 9.5-inch Deep Pie Dish, Lime Green
features: Non-porous glaze will not react with foods or flavors
Crafted of the finest quality stoneware
Hand-sanded base for a smooth, no-scratch surface
Interior ridges provides an effortless way to mold the crust to the dish
description: Little Jack Horner, eat your heart out. Our generously proportioned 9 ½” deep dish pie dish accommodates your deep-dish fruit pies or savory pot-pies. Chantal’s exceptionally strong, non-porous glaze won’t react with foods or flavors. You can slice and serve directly from this dish, without worrying about scratches. Crafted to ensure excellent heat distribution, our pie dish promotes even baking. We hand-sand the base for a smooth, no-scratch surface. It cleans easily in the dishwasher and is oven, microwave and freezer safe. 1¾-qt. capacity.
